content: संस्मृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To remember, think of, call to mind; स्मर संस्मृत्य न शांतिरस्ति मे <ls>Ku. 4. 17</ls>; <ls>Bg. 18. 76</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 149.</ls> {@--2@} To recollect fully. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To remind, put in mind of; (पातालं) मामद्य संस्मरयतीव भुजंगलोकः <ls>Ratn. 1. 13.</ls>
